app.controllers

Class Simulator

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.controllers.Simulator

  • public class Simulator
extends java.lang.Object
    Simulator class that handle all operations about simulation.
    Author:
    Petr Křehlík, Martin Klobušický

      • Simulator

        public Simulator(StreetMap streetMap,
                 BaseGui gui)
          throws java.lang.Exception
        Initialize simulator. Start permanent timer (1 sec).
        Parameters:
        streetMap - Full street map.
        gui - GUI controller.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - When error.

      • handleTrip

        private void handleTrip(Trip trip,
                        Line line)
        Core simulator function. Determine if specific trip on line is active at current simulation time. Draw vehicle position in map.
        Parameters:
        trip - Trip.
        line - Line.

      • simulationRefresh

        private void simulationRefresh()
        Core simulator function. Called every X seconds to refresh position of vehicles.

      • simulationHandle

        private void simulationHandle()
        Core simulator function. Called every second to update simulation time.

      • computeTraffic

        public void computeTraffic()
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Compute new timetable with traffic on streets. Wont work when simulation is running.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - When simulation running.

      • trafficCore

        private void trafficCore(Street street)
        Update timetable when traffic is higher for specific street and lines on that street.
        Parameters:
        street - Street to compute.

        lineStops - List of line stops.
        line - Line object.
        i - Current position.
        follow - Following coordinate.
